entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 9:19 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: ENE 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
